name: spotify-3d-art-gallery
description: A 3D art gallery app that displays user's top Spotify albums as 3D assets with album covers as textures

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=packages/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=packages/api && npm run test --workspace=packages/frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=packages/api && npm run clean --workspace=packages/frontend
